aerohome.com: It was wanted a website, where you could navigate throug a virtual smartphone for the company dedicated to design and build smart houses. There is a lot of Css 3 animations in this project used for the transitions between the website sections.
contactame: Contact me! I would like to read anything than you want to tell me.
descripcion-acerca-de-mi: Hi! I'm an venezuelan youngster graduated from the Universidad Alejandro de Humboldt in Caracas as Informatic Engineering. I'm currently residing in Santiago de Chile. I have arround of two years of experience in web develpoment, taking part in static websites, dinamic websites, web apps and videogames development. I'm a self-taught person and creative featuring tech solutions. My hobbies: Programming and videogames.
deseo-recibir-copia: I want to recieve a copy
diagnosticolorealprofessionnel.com: The company wants to do a survey to their customers about taking care of their hair during a face-to-face event, using an web app throug their smartphones. The app offered an fluid user experience, because it was a single-page application. The back-end was written in Php and the database manager MySQL.
dualemento.com: I'm the co-creator of a freelancers team called Dualemento, where we share and develop techonlogy solutions. The website have a 3D interactive logo of our team with Three.js, and was developed with the framework MaterializeCSS.
